Description: Blue glazed composition shabti; six lines of Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 55 [27].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Maj William Joseph Myers (?)
